assignments.description: Assigns a single record to a record collection variable in order to store a single record in the data table on the next screen
assignments.name: asn_Add_Single_Record_Collection
assignments.label: Add Single Record Collection

assignments.description: Flags the boolean variable when the required field has not been completed
assignments.name: asn_Required_Field_Flag
assignments.label: Required Field Flag

decisions.description: Checks that user has provided values for required fields or has not exceeded character limits on previous screen
decisions.name: dec_Field_Condition_Check
decisions.label: Field Condition Check

decisions.description: Determines if at least one record was found
decisions.name: dec_Records_Found
decisions.label: Records Found

Flow.description: Allows user to create Project Weekly Updates for active Projects via a single screenflow

formulas.description: Calculates the date of the previous Friday
formulas.name: fx_LastFriday
formulas.expression: IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=1 /*SUN*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-2, IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=2 /*MON*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-3, IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=3 /*TUE*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-4, IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=4 /*WED*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-5, IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=5 /*THR*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-6, IF(WEEKDAY({!$Flow.CurrentDate})=6 /*FRI*/, {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-7, /*SAT*/ {!$Flow.CurrentDate}-1))))))

Flow.interviewLabel: Project Weekly Update - Active Project Update Screenflow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Project Weekly Update - Active Project Update Screenflow

loops.description: ***This loop could not be bulkified because Flows do not support Get Records on a record collection at the time of creation
loops.name: lop_Projects_with_PWUs
loops.label: Projects with PWUs

recordCreates.description: Creates Project Weekly Update records from the record collection
recordCreates.name: crt_PWU_Records
recordCreates.label: PWU Records

recordLookups.name: get_Open_Project_Records
recordLookups.label: Open Project Records
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (3 AND 4 AND 5)

screens.name: scn_Confirmation
screens.label: Confirmation

fields.name: txt_Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
A Project Weekly Update has been created for the following Project(s)


The current Project RAG Status listed below reflects any changes as a result of the Project Weekly Update. In addition, you will receive a notification for each Project if the RAG Status has changed.

screens.helpText:
Project RAG Status definition:


RED Risks without Risk Mitigation identified

AMBER Risks with Risk Mitigation identified

GREEN No Risks


*RAG Status will be updated with the highest risk value among all updates related to the Project that have been created since this past Friday (last report out). If the RAG Status changes, you will receive a notification. You still have the ability to manually change the RAG Status at any time.

fields.name: txt_Create_Project_Weekly_Update_Header
fields.fieldText: Create a Project Weekly Update for the following Project

value.stringValue: Create a Project Weekly Update for the following selected Project

fields.fieldText: 2,000 character limit exceeded

fields.fieldText: No active Project records were found

fields.name: txt_Project_Selection_Header
fields.fieldText:
Select one or more Projects to create a Project Weekly Update


Projects displayed include all owned and open, as well as those owned with a LastModified date since the previous Friday

variables.description: Shows as TRUE when the required field has not been completed
variables.name: var_RequiredField
